Interface LinuxDebPackage

All Superinterfaces:
LinuxDebPackageMixin, LinuxPackage, LinuxPackageMixin, Package
public interface LinuxDebPackage extends LinuxPackage, LinuxDebPackageMixin
Linux DEB package.

Use create(jdk.jpackage.internal.model.LinuxPackage, jdk.jpackage.internal.model.LinuxDebPackageMixin) method to create objects implementing this interface.

See Also:
  • https://www.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/ch-binary.html#
  • https://linux.die.net/man/5/deb-control

    • maintainer

      default String maintainer()
      Gets the value of the maintainer property of this DEB package.
      Returns:
      the maintainer property of this DEB package
      See Also:
      • https://www.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/ch-controlfields.html#s-f-maintainer

    • relativeCopyrightFilePath

      default Optional<Path> relativeCopyrightFilePath()
      Gets the relative path to this DEB package's copyright file. Returns empty Optional instance if this DEB package has no copyright file.
      Returns:
      the relative path to the copyright file of this DEB package

    • create

      static LinuxDebPackage create(LinuxPackage pkg, LinuxDebPackageMixin mixin)
      Constructs LinuxDebPackage instance from the given LinuxPackage and LinuxDebPackageMixin instances.
      Parameters:
      pkg - the Linux package
      mixin - DEB-specific details supplementing the Linux package
      Returns:
      the proxy dispatching calls to the given objects
